typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empId as short,
		empName as string,
		empGender as string,
		deptId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
Employee alterRow(deleteIf(deptId==2),
	upsertIf(deptId==3)) ~> AlterationMade
AlterationMade sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		EmpGender = empGender,
		EmpID = empId,
		EmpName = empName,
		DeptId = deptId
	)) ~> EmptoDB
